alert.note: Alert for Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 9:42PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1030 PM MST... At 942 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Estrella, or 15 miles south of Goodyear, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goodyear, Estrella Mountain Ranch and Rainbow Valley. This includes AZ Route 85 between mile markers 138 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
